    // a[key as Extract<keyof U, string>] = b[key] as any
    a[key] = b[key] as any

//é‡è½½ç­¾å
function getId(id: string): string;
function getId(id: number): number;

//å®ç°ç­¾å
function getId(id: unknown): unknown {
	if (typeof id === 'string') {
		return id;
	}
	return id;
}

//function getId(id: string): string (+1 overload)
getId('åˆ€åˆ€');
